VA3.F.summary: Van Lanschot Kempen N.V. provides financial services in the Netherlands and internationally. The company operates through Private Banking, Evi, Asset Management, Merchant Banking, and Other Activities segments. It offers personal wealth management services to high net-worth individuals, entrepreneurs, family businesses, business professionals and executives, healthcare professionals, foundations, and associations. The company also provides online wealth management services, including asset management, savings, and pension solutions; comprehensive fiduciary wealth management services; long-term focused niche investment strategies; and asset management services focusing on various asset classes, such as on high dividend equities, small caps, real estate, infrastructure, credits, government bonds, sustainable value creation, funds of hedge funds, and private markets. In addition, it provides merchant banking services comprises of equities research and trading; capital market transactions; corporate finance; and debt advisory services for corporate and institutional clients. The company was formerly known as Van Lanschot NV and changed its name to Van Lanschot Kempen N.V. in June 2017. Van Lanschot Kempen N.V. was founded in 1737 and is headquartered in Âs-Hertogenbosch, the Netherlands.
